description: Sustainability reporting increases shareholder value by heightening an organization’s awareness to remain robust and resilient through deployment of sustainable and efficient processes. ESG Investing has grown almost tenfold in just 3 years as investors realize that a strong ESG proposition can safeguard a company’s long-term success. There is a clear link that the financial performance of companies correlates to how well they handle ESG risks. While ESG investing is not a miracle cure, this is the right thing for you to do, the smart thing to do, and the time to do so is now.
title: Sustainability Reporting and ESG Investing
